1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated:"The Prophet asked me: "What is in your Idawah (water skin)?" I said: "Nabidh." He said: "Dates are wholesome and water is pure." He said: "So he performed Wudu with it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُضُوءِ بِالنَّبِيذِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related About] Wudu' With Nabidh
